attributes.action: to return the tax credit system to private pension funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Treasurer is taking 5 billion pounds a year from private pension funds - this was done by abolishing the tax credit on shares - retirees' are not going to enjoy the same amount of retirement funds to live off and therefore will become partially reliant upon the state - the countries pension system is in melt-down. No politician is willing to bite-the-bullet and get to grips with this catastrophy. 
NO BODY IS LISTENING!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
